Its capital is Hanoi, but Ho Chi Minh City is also a major hub.
An Arab country located at the southern end of the Arabian Peninsula.
Known for its unique ancient architecture, especially in Sana'a.
Borders Saudi Arabia and Oman.
A landlocked country in Southern Africa.
Home to Victoria Falls, one of the world's largest waterfalls.
Known for its diverse wildlife and national parks.
A landlocked country in Southern Africa.
Also home to Victoria Falls, which it shares with Zambia.
Known for its abundant wildlife and ancient ruins, like Great Zimbabwe.
